name: Opcfoundation.GitHub.io
tagline: About the OPC Foundation and OPC Technology
body:
### Welcome to the OPC Foundation GitHub Pages.
The[OPC Foundation](https://opcfoundation.org)is a non-profit technology standards organization responsible for OPC Unified Architecture and the Classic COM-based specifications DA, HDA, A&E, Batch, Security, XMLDA, and others.

### Unified Architecture (UA)
UA is the latest technology for securely sharing data between different applications, systems, or platforms. Data can be simple scalar types, structures, or complex objects. Interoperability is assured via the open architecture, shared stacks, and a [Certification](https://opcfoundation.org/certification/overview-benefits/) program.

### Support or Contact
Contact the OPC Foundation [administrators](mailto:office@opcfoundation.org)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
